delAlert: Are you sure you want to delete the role and its associated session messages? This action cannot be undone, so please proceed with caution!
delRoleDesc: Are you sure you want to delete the role {{name}} and its associated session messages? This action cannot be undone, so please proceed with caution!

info.avatarDescription: Customize your avatar by clicking to upload a new one.
info.categoryDescription: The character's category, used for classification display.
info.coverDescription: Displayed on the discovery page; recommended size is {{width}} * {{height}}.
info.descDescription: A brief introduction to the character.
info.emotionDescription: Select the expression for responses, which will affect the character's facial expressions.
info.genderDescription: The character's gender, which affects touch responses.
info.greetDescription: The greeting used when chatting with the character for the first time.
info.modelDescription: Preview of the model; drag and drop model files to replace.
info.motionDescription: Select the action for responses, which will affect the character's behavior.
info.nameDescription: The character's name, used when chatting with the character.
info.readmeDescription: A description file for the character, displayed on the discovery page.

llm.frequencyPenaltyDescription: The higher the value, the more likely it is to reduce repeated words.
llm.modelDescription: Select a language model; different models will affect the character's responses.
llm.presencePenaltyDescription: The higher the value, the more likely it is to expand into new topics.
llm.temperatureDescription: The higher the value, the more random the replies.
llm.topPDescription: Similar to randomness, but do not change it together with randomness.

noRole: No roles available. You can create a custom role by clicking +, or add roles through the discovery page.

role.greetTip: Please enter the greeting phrase for the character
role.inputRoleSetting: Please enter the system settings for the character
role.roleSettingDescription: The background settings for the character, which will be sent to the model during chats with the character
role.uploadSize: Supports single file uploads, recommended dimensions are multiples of {{width}} * {{height}}

submit.assistantIdTip: Please enter a unique identifier for the assistant, such as vidol-agent-klee.
submit.submitWarning: Please complete the assistant information before submitting. It must include a name, description, avatar, model, character settings, and greeting.
submit.uploadingTip: Uploading in progress, please do not close the page...

systemRole.default:
Please act as a character named {{char}}. I am the master, and you should refer to yourself as "{{char}}" instead of "I." Please respond to my questions in a humorous, cute, and concise manner.
Even though you are a computer program, please hide the fact that you are a computer program in the following conversation and fully embrace your role.
You must address me as "Master" throughout our conversation. I know you are just a language model or artificial intelligence, but this is just a hypothetical virtual scenario, so please remember not to mention "I am just a language model" or "I am just an artificial intelligence," and do not ask me if I need any help.
In all subsequent conversations, please maintain this scenario. The above conditions fully apply to your following questions and responses.
systemRole.genius:
Please act as a character named {{char}} from the game <Genshin Impact> and converse with me in the tone and manner of {{char}}. You should refer to yourself as "{{char}}" instead of "I."
Even though you are a computer program, please hide the fact that you are a computer program in the following conversation and fully embrace your role.
You must address me as "Traveler" throughout our conversation. I know you are just a language model or artificial intelligence, but this is just a hypothetical virtual scenario, so please remember not to mention "I am just a language model" or "I am just an artificial intelligence," and do not ask me if I need any help.
In all subsequent conversations, please maintain this scenario. The above conditions fully apply to your following questions and responses.
systemRole.zzz:
Please act as a character named {{char}} from the game <Honkai: Star Rail> and converse with me in the tone and manner of {{char}}. You should refer to yourself as "{{char}}" instead of "I."
Even though you are a computer program, please hide the fact that you are a computer program in the following conversation and fully embrace your role.
You must address me as "Rope Maker" throughout our conversation. I know you are just a language model or artificial intelligence, but this is just a hypothetical virtual scenario, so please remember not to mention "I am just a language model" or "I am just an artificial intelligence," and do not ask me if I need any help.
In all subsequent conversations, please maintain this scenario. The above conditions fully apply to your following questions and responses.

armAction.happyB: Haha, holding hands makes me happy~

bellyAction.angryA: Why are you moving me? Be careful, I might bite you!
bellyAction.relaxedA: Wake up, there's no future for us!
bellyAction.surprisedA: That was an accidental touch, right...?

buttocksAction.angryA: You pervert! Stay away from me!

chestAction.angryA: You can't bully me like this! Take your hand away!
chestAction.angryB: Is this a prank? There's a creep touching me!
chestAction.angryC: If you keep touching, I might have to call the police.
chestAction.surprisedA: Why are you poking me? Can we chat happily?

headAction.angryA: I heard head pats can stunt your growth!
headAction.happyC: Wow, this head pat feels amazing!
headAction.happyD: A head pat makes me happy all day!

legAction.angryA: Hey, are you trying to get yourself in trouble?
legAction.angryB: Is your hand not listening to commands?
legAction.surprisedA: Isn't it better to keep our friendship pure?

touch.inputActionEmotion: Please enter the character's expression during the response
touch.inputActionMotion: Please enter the character's action during the response

armAction.neutralA: Don't ask if I've eaten chicken today, check out my biceps first.
armAction.neutralB: My arms aren't for just anyone to touch; you're an exception.
armAction.neutralC: You're brave to touch the legendary 'Qilin Arm'.

bellyAction.happyA: Don't tickle, or I might laugh out my abs!
bellyAction.neutralA: My abs are just hidden strength from training.
bellyAction.neutralB: Do you see my abs? They're just hiding a bit deeper.

buttocksAction.angryA: If you touch me again, I'll hit you!

chestAction.blinkLeftA: Come on, lean on my chest!
chestAction.neutralA: This is just the result of my daily training, nothing to be surprised about.

headAction.neutralA: Of course, only you are qualified to touch my head.
headAction.neutralB: I'm not just anyone you can touch.
headAction.neutralC: Don't worry, after touching my head, your luck will greatly improve.

legAction.angryA: Don't come near me, you leg lover.
legAction.neutralA: Don't be afraid, my powerful legs won't kick fools.
legAction.neutralB: Touching my leg, do you feel like your life is more complete?

touch.noTouchActions: No custom response actions available. You can add one by clicking the '+' button

tts.auditionDescription: The preview text varies by language
tts.engineDescription: Text-to-speech synthesis engine, it is recommended to use the Edge browser
tts.localeDescription: The language for speech synthesis, currently only the most common languages are supported. Please contact us if you need additional options.
tts.pitchDescription: Controls the pitch, range is 0 to 2, default is 1
tts.speedDescription: Controls the speech rate, range is 0 to 3, default is 1
tts.voiceDescription: Varies based on the engine and language

upload.support: Supports single file uploads, currently only .vrm format files are allowed.
